FALLING THROUGH GLASS
by Barbara Sheridan
a work of historical fiction publ=
ished by Liquid Silver Books  
which will first be released in e-book forma=
t on Sept 28th.

com/

I can't wait for this book to come out in paperback format but I admit th=
e e-book format is sooo affordable.  FALLING THROUGH GLASS is a classy mxf =
romance with the right balance of action and adventure.  I enjoyed reading =
the early drafts, under the title of Mirror, Mirror, of this work but the F=
INAL FORM in which this work has taken is FABULOUS FOLKS!

:: SQUEEEEEEE ::=


So one of our very own SHQ members will be the first non-Japanese
to publ=
ish a work of historical fiction featuring the Shinsengumi.
